page.title: 20 RECREATION
page.content: With regard to recreation, as with Arts and Crafts, activities are centred in and around the home. Sport is not an organised activity in the area but appears to take place on an individual basis. Gardening seems to be the dominant form of recreation and many gardens reflect this interest. Sports enjoyed include shooting and golf - the former taking place within the confines of Harnage Grange. Walking is another form of recreation within the area. There are no facilities for public recreation e.g. swimming,pool or football. People will have to travel to Shrewsbury in order to take part in these activities. Not a great deal of television is watched, with most people watching news programmes and an occasional interest shown in soap operas.
